sentences.en: All the young people in the village are capable of making mattings with basketry strips.
sentences.cn: 村子里的年轻人都会用席篾编织席子.

sentences.en: Discolouration of silver and basketry - inlaid silver artwares and the protection technology were studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了含有少量铜锌成分的银片或银丝笆镶嵌的银制工艺品变色及各种新工艺的防变色效果.

sentences.en: Eva specializes in one of the most difficult techniques of basketry.
sentences.cn: 伊娃专攻一种最难的编织篮筐的技艺。

words.tran_cn: 篮子；（篮球比赛的）得分；一篮之量；篮筐；vt. 装入篮

trans.tran_cn: 篮筐类，像篮筐类编织的物品，编制篮筐的技艺，（总称）篮子
trans.tran_en: Basketry is baskets made by weaving together thin strips of materials such as wood
